description: Supplier to supply and deliver 2TB M.2 Solid State Drive as per Annex A-Statement of Requirement and Annex B-List of Deliverables and Prices in the Request for Quotation
full_summary:
# 2TB M.2 Solid State Drive for the Department of National Defence

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: BPM019716/24048
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: 2023-10-04
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-18 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A
* Tender Status: Expired

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitively bid open tender
* Solicitation Method: Request for Quotation (RFQ)
* List of Deliverables: Refer to Annex A
* PDFs can be downloaded from https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/... and https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/...
* Evaluation Criteria: Responsive bid with the lowest price

## Contract Driver

* The Department of National Defence intends to acquire 2 TB M.2 Solid State Drive for the Shared Services Canada.
* Delivery is to Ottawa, ON.
* Delivery Timeframe: 90 working days from contract award.
* Security Requirements: N/A
* CLCA: N/A

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Sébastien Majd, Darif
* Contact Email: None
* Contact Phone: (613) 866-5465
* Contact Fax: (613) 866-5465
* Contact Address: 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor, Ottawa, ON, K2P 2N1, Canada

Please note that the contractor accidentally shared two different French descriptions for reasons unknown. Here are some things to consider:

* They accidentally shared two identical attachments for the Sans Deutsch translation. In a real-world scenario, you would simply choose one of the identical files . Removing the extra should make it cleaner for our output. 
* For French readers, one description is simply an exact quote of the English. Another seems unhelpful and might be important to provide more information about the description of the CKFTA CFTA Agreements but is unclear what it should contain in the French translation.

In that case, we might keep one of those and remove unnecessary duplication. To avoid duplication and confusion, you should consider whether to keep one of the unnecessary materials or explain that you ignored it in your short summary. . Here's how you would explain that
